content: What is the largest country?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 1
Which is the largest country?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 1
Which country has the highest population?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 1
Which countries have a population over 100 million?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > 100000000 ORDER BY population DESC
What are the countries with negative population growth?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth < 0 ORDER BY population_growth ASC
Which country has the highest birth rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate DESC LIMIT 1
Show me countries with more water area than land area
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water > area_land ORDER BY area_water DESC
Which countries have a death rate higher than their birth rate?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate > birth_rate ORDER BY (death_rate - birth_rate) DESC
What are the top 5 most populous countries?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 5
Which countries have high migration rates but low population growth?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate > 2 AND population_growth < 1 ORDER BY migration_rate DESC
Find countries with no water area
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water = 0 OR area_water IS NULL
Which countries have a flag containing stars in its description?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%star%' OR flag_description LIKE '%Star%'
What are the smallest countries by total area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area ASC LIMIT 5
Show countries with high birth rates but low population growth
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 20 AND population_growth < 1 ORDER BY birth_rate DESC
Which countries have perfectly balanced birth and death rates?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(birth_rate - death_rate) < 0.1 ORDER BY ABS(birth_rate - death_rate)
Find countries where water makes up more than 10% of total area
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT) > 0.1 ORDER BY CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT) DESC
Which countries have the word 'Republic' in their name?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Republic%'
What are the countries with extreme population density?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population / CAST(area_land AS FLOAT) > 1000 ORDER BY population / CAST(area_land AS FLOAT) DESC
Find countries with both high birth rates and high death rates
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 30 AND death_rate > 15 ORDER BY (birth_rate + death_rate) DESC
Which countries have unusual migration patterns?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(migration_rate) > 10 ORDER BY ABS(migration_rate) DESC
What countries have the most balanced ratio of land to water?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water > 0 AND ABS(CAST(area_land AS FLOAT) / CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) - 1) < 0.1
What are the countries with population between 10 million and 50 million?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population BETWEEN 10000000 AND 50000000 ORDER BY population DESC
Find countries where the land area is less than 1000 square kilometers
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_land < 1000 ORDER BY area_land ASC
Which countries have both high birth rate and high migration rate?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 25 AND migration_rate > 5 ORDER BY birth_rate DESC
Show me countries where water area is exactly 0
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water = 0
What countries have 'Islands' in their name?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Islands%' OR name LIKE '%islands%'
Find countries where the total area is not equal to the sum of land and water area
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area != (COALESCE(area_land, 0) + COALESCE(area_water, 0))
Which countries have a population growth rate above 3%?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth > 3 ORDER BY population_growth DESC
Show countries with the word 'Democratic' in their name
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Democratic%'
What are the countries with zero or negative migration rate?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate <= 0 ORDER BY migration_rate ASC
Find countries where death rate is twice the birth rate
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate > birth_rate * 2 ORDER BY death_rate DESC
Which countries have a flag containing the color red?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%red%' OR flag_description LIKE '%Red%'
Show me the top 10 countries by land area
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_land DESC LIMIT 10
What countries have more than 50% of their area as water?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT) > 0.5 ORDER BY CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT) DESC
Find countries with exactly matching land and water areas
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_land = area_water AND area_water > 0
Which countries have the lowest population density?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_land > 0 ORDER BY CAST(population AS FLOAT) / CAST(area_land AS FLOAT) ASC LIMIT 5
Show countries where population is growing despite negative migration rate
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth > 0 AND migration_rate < 0 ORDER BY population_growth DESC
Find countries with 'United' in their name and high population
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%United%' AND population > 10000000 ORDER BY population DESC
What countries have both birth rate and death rate below global average?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate < (SELECT AVG(birth_rate) FROM countries) AND death_rate < (SELECT AVG(death_rate) FROM countries)
Show countries where migration rate is higher than population growth
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate > population_growth ORDER BY (migration_rate - population_growth) DESC
Which countries have population greater than the average population?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > (SELECT AVG(population) FROM countries) ORDER BY population DESC
Find countries with 'Kingdom' in their name or description
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Kingdom%' OR flag_description LIKE '%kingdom%'
What are the countries with unusually high death rates?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate > (SELECT AVG(death_rate) + 2 * (SELECT stddev(death_rate) FROM countries) FROM countries) ORDER BY death_rate DESC
Show countries where water area is between 10% and 20% of total area
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT) BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.2 ORDER BY CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT) DESC
Which countries have perfectly balanced migration (rate near 0)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(migration_rate) < 0.1 ORDER BY ABS(migration_rate) ASC
Find countries where population growth doesn't match natural growth
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(population_growth - (birth_rate - death_rate + migration_rate)) > 1 ORDER BY ABS(population_growth - (birth_rate - death_rate + migration_rate)) DESC
Which 5 countries have the highest birth rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate DESC LIMIT 5
Which countries have negative population growth?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth < 0 ORDER BY population_growth ASC
What are the countries with more water area than land area?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water > area_land ORDER BY area_water DESC
Which countries have both high birth rates (>30) and high death rates (>15)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 30 AND death_rate > 15 ORDER BY birth_rate DESC
What are the 3 smallest countries by total area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area ASC LIMIT 3
Which countries have positive migration rates but negative population growth?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate > 0 AND population_growth < 0 ORDER BY population_growth ASC
What countries have flags that contain the word 'star' in their description?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%star%' ORDER BY name
Which countries have more than 20% of their area as water?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE (CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT)) > 0.2 ORDER BY (CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT)) DESC
What are the countries where the death rate exceeds the birth rate?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate > birth_rate ORDER BY (death_rate - birth_rate) DESC
Which countries have a population density greater than 1000 people per square kilometer?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE (CAST(population AS FLOAT) / CAST(area_land AS FLOAT)) > 1000 ORDER BY (CAST(population AS FLOAT) / CAST(area_land AS FLOAT)) DESC
What countries have both zero migration rate and zero population growth?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate = 0 AND population_growth = 0
Which countries have perfect balance between birth and death rates (difference less than 0.1)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(birth_rate - death_rate) < 0.1 ORDER BY ABS(birth_rate - death_rate)
What are the top 5 countries with the highest proportion of water area to total area?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area > 0 ORDER BY (CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / CAST(area AS FLOAT)) DESC LIMIT 5
Which countries have a population greater than the average population of all countries?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > (SELECT AVG(population) FROM countries) ORDER BY population DESC
What countries have the word 'Republic' in their name and negative population growth?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Republic%' AND population_growth < 0 ORDER BY population_growth ASC
Which countries have no water area but population over 10 million?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water = 0 AND population > 10000000 ORDER BY population DESC
What are the countries where migration rate has a bigger impact than natural growth (birth-death rate)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(migration_rate) > ABS(birth_rate - death_rate) ORDER BY ABS(migration_rate) DESC
Which countries have flags containing both 'red' and 'blue' in their description?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%red%' AND flag_description LIKE '%blue%' ORDER BY name
What countries have exactly the same birth and death rates?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate = death_rate ORDER BY birth_rate DESC
Which countries have a land area smaller than their water area but a population over 1 million?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water > area_land AND population > 1000000 ORDER BY population DESC
Show me all countries that start with 'A'
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name
What are the 5 smallest countries by population?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population ASC LIMIT 5
Which countries have zero water area?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water = 0 ORDER BY name
Show countries with population less than 1 million
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population < 1000000 ORDER BY population DESC
Which countries have a birth rate higher than 30?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 30 ORDER BY birth_rate DESC
Show me countries that end with 'land'
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%land' ORDER BY name
What countries have zero population growth?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth = 0 ORDER BY name
Show the 10 most populated countries
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 10
Which countries have a death rate lower than 5?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate < 5 ORDER BY death_rate ASC
Show countries with positive migration rate
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate > 0 ORDER BY migration_rate DESC
What countries have 'Island' in their name?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Island%' ORDER BY name
Show countries with area greater than 1 million
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area > 1000000 ORDER BY area DESC
Which countries have flags containing the word 'cross'?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%cross%' ORDER BY name
Show me countries with population between 5 and 10 million
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population BETWEEN 5000000 AND 10000000 ORDER BY population DESC
What are the 3 countries with the lowest death rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY death_rate ASC LIMIT 3
Show countries that start with 'New'
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY name
Which countries have no migration?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate = 0 ORDER BY name
Show countries with birth rate less than 10
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate < 10 ORDER BY birth_rate ASC
What countries contain the word 'United' in their name?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%United%' ORDER BY name
Show me the 5 largest countries by land area
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_land DESC LIMIT 5
Show countries where the population is above average but area is below average
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > (SELECT AVG(population) FROM countries) AND area < (SELECT AVG(area) FROM countries) ORDER BY population DESC
Which countries have a birth rate higher than death rate by at least 10?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE (birth_rate - death_rate) >= 10 ORDER BY (birth_rate - death_rate) DESC
Find countries where water makes up more than 10% of total area and population is over 5 million
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE (CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / area) > 0.1 AND population > 5000000 ORDER BY (CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / area) DESC
Which countries have both 'Republic' in their name and a red flag (mentioned in description)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Republic%' AND flag_description LIKE '%red%' ORDER BY name
Show countries with population growth above 2% but negative migration rate
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth > 2 AND migration_rate < 0 ORDER BY population_growth DESC
Find the top 5 most densely populated countries that have a total area over 10000
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area > 10000 ORDER BY (CAST(population AS FLOAT) / area) DESC LIMIT 5
Which countries have either very high birth rate (>40) or very low death rate (<5)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 40 OR death_rate < 5 ORDER BY birth_rate DESC, death_rate ASC
Show countries where the land area is between 25% and 75% of total area
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE (CAST(area_land AS FLOAT) / area) BETWEEN 0.25 AND 0.75 ORDER BY (CAST(area_land AS FLOAT) / area)
Find countries that have both 'green' and 'yellow' in their flag description, ordered by population
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%green%' AND flag_description LIKE '%yellow%' ORDER BY population DESC
Which countries have population growth rate higher than both birth rate and migration rate?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth > birth_rate AND population_growth > migration_rate ORDER BY population_growth DESC
Show countries where the death rate is more than twice the average death rate
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate > 2 * (SELECT AVG(death_rate) FROM countries) ORDER BY death_rate DESC
Find countries that start with 'S' and have above-average population density
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE 'S%' AND (CAST(population AS FLOAT) / area) > (SELECT AVG(CAST(population AS FLOAT) / area) FROM countries) ORDER BY (CAST(population AS FLOAT) / area) DESC
Which countries have a total area larger than their population (in square meters per person)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE (CAST(area AS FLOAT) * 1000000) > population ORDER BY (CAST(area AS FLOAT) * 1000000 / population) DESC
Show countries where migration has more impact than births (migration rate > birth rate) but population is still growing
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(migration_rate) > birth_rate AND population_growth > 0 ORDER BY migration_rate DESC
Find countries where the combined area of their neighbors (sharing borders, mentioned in flag description) is mentioned
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%border%' OR flag_description LIKE '%neighbor%' ORDER BY name
Which countries have all rates (birth, death, migration, population growth) positive?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 0 AND death_rate > 0 AND migration_rate > 0 AND population_growth > 0 ORDER BY (birth_rate + death_rate + migration_rate + population_growth) DESC
Show countries where water area is greater than the average water area but land area is less than the average land area
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water > (SELECT AVG(area_water) FROM countries) AND area_land < (SELECT AVG(area_land) FROM countries) ORDER BY area_water DESC
Find countries with names containing spaces and population over the median population

SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '% %' AND population > (SELECT AVG(population) FROM (SELECT population FROM countries ORDER BY population LIMIT 2 - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM countries) % 2, 1 + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM countries) % 2)) ORDER BY population DESC
Which countries have balanced demographics (all rates within 5% of each other)?

SELECT * FROM countries WHERE ABS(birth_rate - death_rate) < 5 AND ABS(death_rate - migration_rate) < 5 AND ABS(migration_rate - birth_rate) < 5 ORDER BY (ABS(birth_rate - death_rate) + ABS(death_rate - migration_rate) + ABS(migration_rate - birth_rate))
Show countries where the name length is greater than the number of words in their flag description
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE LENGTH(name) > (LENGTH(flag_description) - LENGTH(REPLACE(flag_description, ' ', '')) + 1) ORDER BY LENGTH(name) DESC
Show me all countries that start with B
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY name
Which countries have population over 50 million?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > 50000000 ORDER BY population DESC
Show the 3 largest countries
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 3
Which countries have red in their flag?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%red%' ORDER BY name
Show countries with zero birth rate
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate = 0 ORDER BY name
What are the 5 smallest countries?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area ASC LIMIT 5
Show me countries that end with 'ia'
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%ia' ORDER BY name
Which countries have a death rate over 15?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate > 15 ORDER BY death_rate DESC
Show the 10 least populated countries
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population ASC LIMIT 10
Which countries have blue in their flag?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%blue%' ORDER BY name
Show countries with negative migration rate
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate < 0 ORDER BY migration_rate ASC
What countries start with 'C'?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY name
Show countries with area less than 1000
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area < 1000 ORDER BY area ASC
Which countries have stars in their flag?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%star%' ORDER BY name
Show the 5 countries with highest birth rate
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate DESC LIMIT 5
Which countries have 'Republic' in their name?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%Republic%' ORDER BY name
Show countries with population under 100000
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population < 100000 ORDER BY population DESC
What countries end with 'a'?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%a' ORDER BY name
Show the 3 countries with lowest death rate
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY death_rate ASC LIMIT 3
Which countries have green in their flag?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%green%' ORDER BY name
Which country has the smallest area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area ASC LIMIT 1
What are the top 5 most densely populated countries?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC, area ASC LIMIT 5
Which countries have a population growth rate over 2%?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth > 2 ORDER BY population_growth DESC
What is the country with the highest birth rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate DESC LIMIT 1
List countries with a migration rate below 0.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate < 0 ORDER BY migration_rate ASC
Which countries have an area greater than 1 million square kilometers?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area > 1000000 ORDER BY area DESC
What are the top 3 countries with the highest death rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY death_rate DESC LIMIT 3
Which country has the smallest land area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_land ASC LIMIT 1
Find all countries with a water area greater than 50,000 square kilometers.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water > 50000 ORDER BY area_water DESC
Which country has the lowest population?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population ASC LIMIT 1
List countries where the population growth rate is less than 0.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth < 0 ORDER BY population_growth ASC
What is the country with the highest ratio of water area to total area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY CAST(area_water AS FLOAT) / area DESC LIMIT 1
Find countries where birth rate exceeds death rate by more than 10.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate - death_rate > 10 ORDER BY birth_rate - death_rate DESC
What is the country with the lowest migration rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY migration_rate ASC LIMIT 1
Which countries have both a high birth rate (over 30) and a low death rate (under 5)?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 30 AND death_rate < 5 ORDER BY birth_rate DESC
List all countries with a flag description containing the word 'star'.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%star%' ORDER BY name ASC
What is the average population growth rate of all countries?
SELECT AVG(population_growth) AS average_population_growth FROM countries
Which country has the highest land-to-water area ratio?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY CAST(area_land AS FLOAT) / area_water DESC LIMIT 1
Find countries where the population density exceeds 1000 per square kilometer.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE CAST(population AS FLOAT) / area > 1000 ORDER BY population DESC
Which country has the lowest birth rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate ASC LIMIT 1
Show all countries with a population over 50 million.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > 50000000 ORDER BY population DESC
List countries with a death rate under 5.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate < 5 ORDER BY death_rate ASC
Find countries with a migration rate above 1.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate > 1 ORDER BY migration_rate DESC
Which countries have a population growth rate above 1.5%?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth > 1.5 ORDER BY population_growth DESC
Show countries with an area under 100,000 square kilometers.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area < 100000 ORDER BY area ASC
List all countries with a birth rate over 20.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate > 20 ORDER BY birth_rate DESC
Which countries have a population below 5 million?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population < 5000000 ORDER BY population ASC
Show countries with a water area of more than 10,000 square kilometers.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water > 10000 ORDER BY area_water DESC
List countries with a death rate above 10.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE death_rate > 10 ORDER BY death_rate DESC
Find countries with a population growth rate under 0.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population_growth < 0 ORDER BY population_growth ASC
Show countries with a migration rate below -2.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate < -2 ORDER BY migration_rate ASC
Which countries have an area land over 500,000 square kilometers?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_land > 500000 ORDER BY area_land DESC
List all countries where the birth rate is lower than the death rate.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate < death_rate ORDER BY name ASC
Find all countries where the population is under 1 million.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population < 1000000 ORDER BY population ASC
Show countries with a migration rate equal to 0.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE migration_rate = 0 ORDER BY name ASC
Which countries have a flag description that mentions 'red'?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE flag_description LIKE '%red%' ORDER BY name ASC
List all countries where the population is above 10 million but below 50 million.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > 10000000 AND population < 50000000 ORDER BY population DESC
Show all countries with an area land of exactly 100,000 square kilometers.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_land = 100000 ORDER BY name ASC
List countries with a birth rate of exactly 15.
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE birth_rate = 15 ORDER BY name ASC
Which countries have a water area below 1,000 square kilometers?
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE area_water < 1000 ORDER BY area_water ASC
What are the top 10 countries by population?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 10
Which is the smallest country by area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area ASC LIMIT 1
What are the top 5 countries with the largest water area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_water DESC LIMIT 5
List the top 3 countries with the highest birth rates.
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate DESC LIMIT 3
Which country has the smallest population?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population ASC LIMIT 1
What are the top 10 countries with the lowest death rates?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY death_rate ASC LIMIT 10
Which is the largest country by land area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_land DESC LIMIT 1
List the top 5 countries with the smallest migration rates.
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY migration_rate ASC LIMIT 5
Which is the largest country by total area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 1
What are the top 3 countries with the largest population growth rates?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population_growth DESC LIMIT 3
List the top 10 countries with the largest land areas.
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_land DESC LIMIT 10
Which country has the smallest land area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_land ASC LIMIT 1
What are the top 5 countries with the smallest birth rates?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate ASC LIMIT 5
Which is the smallest country by water area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area_water ASC LIMIT 1
List the top 3 countries with the highest migration rates.
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY migration_rate DESC LIMIT 3
Which countries have the smallest population growth rates?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population_growth ASC LIMIT 10
What are the top 5 countries by total area?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 5
Which is the country with the smallest birth rate?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY birth_rate ASC LIMIT 1
What are the top 10 countries with the highest death rates?
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY death_rate DESC LIMIT 10
List the top 3 countries with the largest populations but smallest land areas.
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC, area_land ASC LIMIT 3
